name: Purrfect Apawcalypse IF3
description:
A few days after the tragedy at Hanako-Land... Kemono-High and Hachiko-High are back to their normal hustle and bustle.  However, there is still something left to be done...

When a softly puppy and a delinquent shepherd meet, all the mysteries are revealed and Kemono-Town's greatest crisis arrives! Will it be the dog, the cat, ...or the demon that has the last laugh?

This game is the PA series Fan-game and Last part of IF-Tetralogy!! Play the origin-series here! AND Play the IF-series first game here!

This game  is an apocalyptic dog dating dog your own dogventure fiction game. Trigger warnings include cartoon gore, bifurcated dogs, headless dogs, generally dogs not having a great time. Play at your own discretion!  Almost musics, Arts and programming by Rawfish, Some arts and musics by 90%studios. created using Renpy!
